name: LDJam48-AMusicalInterlude
description:
Make a virtual Rube Goldburg machine for playing bells with marbles.

A tune has been laid out in a long deep tunnel and can be played to the marbles as they fall down the tunnel.

Place some buffers, bouncers and arrows to direct the falling balls. When they strike the 'bells' they will make a sound. I'm sure sure if it is actually possible to play the tune (you might be able to guess it :) )but it fun* trying.

Controls.

W,S and Up/Down arrows move the screen up and down the tunnel.
Items to place in the tunnel can be found in a toolbar at the bottom.
Select the items by clicking on their icon in the toolbar,
Left click to place the item in the world.
Right click to remove an item.
R to rotate the item.
You can't rotate a placed item, but you can remove it with a right click and then place it again.
